# Huzain Koleosho - Freelance Web Designer & Developer

> Professional web design and development services for small businesses. I build fast, modern, mobile-friendly websites that help businesses attract customers and grow online.

## About

Huzain Koleosho is a freelance web designer and developer who helps small businesses get websites that actually work. Specializing in custom website design, responsive development, and SEO setup.

Website: https://huzain.work
Services: https://huzain.work/services
Email: koleoshohuzain@gmail.com

## Services Offered

### Web Design & Development
- Custom website design (not templates)
- Mobile-responsive development
- Fast-loading websites (under 3 seconds)
- SEO basics setup
- Contact forms and booking integrations
- Post-launch support and training

### Free Website Audit
- No-cost review of existing websites
- Identifies what's working and what's not
- Actionable recommendations
- No obligation

## Pricing

### Starter Package: $800 - $1,200
Best for: Simple online presence
- Up to 3 pages (Home, About, Contact)
- Mobile-responsive design
- Contact form
- Basic SEO setup
- 1 round of revisions
- 7 days post-launch support

### Professional Package: $2,000 - $3,000
Best for: Businesses ready to grow
- Up to 6 pages
- Mobile-responsive design
- Contact form + booking integration
- Blog or news section (optional)
- SEO setup + Google Business optimization tips
- 2 rounds of revisions
- 14 days post-launch support
- Basic analytics setup

### Custom Package: Contact for pricing
Best for: Larger projects or specific needs
- Unlimited pages
- E-commerce functionality
- Custom features & integrations
- Priority support
- Ongoing maintenance (optional)

## Tech Stack

- React / Next.js
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Modern frontend technologies
- Performance-optimized builds

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How much does a website cost?
A: Starter websites start at $800-$1,200. Professional websites range from $2,000-$3,000. Custom projects are priced based on requirements.

Q: How long does it take to build a website?
A: Most projects take 2-4 weeks from start to finish, depending on size and complexity.

Q: Do you redesign existing websites?
A: Yes. We start with an audit to see what's worth keeping and what needs improvement.

Q: Will I be able to update the website myself?
A: Yes. The site is set up for easy updates, and training is included.

Q: Do you offer payment plans?
A: Yes. Standard terms are 50% upfront, 50% on launch.

## Ideal Clients

- Small business owners who need a professional online presence
- Businesses with outdated websites that need a refresh
- Companies losing customers to competitors with better websites
- Anyone who wants a fast, modern, mobile-friendly website
